sections.heading: 605. Competency of judge as witness
sections.text: The judge presiding at the trial may not testify in that trial as a witness. No objection need be made in order to preserve the point.SourceLaws 1975, LB 279, ยง 38.Annotations1. Judge as witness2. Applicability3. Objection4. Miscellaneous1. Judge as witnessComment
